name: Shrumblo and the magical Grumblo (Squidnow)
description:
A return to arcade style games where the only goal is to have simple fun and earn points! Control the little robot Shrumblo to lead Grumblo into his own spikes to earn points, he gets faster as your score increases. 

There's also a demo available that allows you to get up to 15 points to see if you like the style of the game. If you purchase the full game there's also an alternate game with two Grumblos.

The game has been thoroughly tested but just in case, please report any issues you find in the comments.
